para.text: The print result can be previewed before actually printing it on paper.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: menu to open the Print dialog box and enter the diagram information (see the “Printing Diagram” section).

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: button at the bottom of the Print dialog box.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: At the Print Preview dialog box, preview the print result by selecting to preview by one page or two pages.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: button to print from this window, or click the
button to close the preview window.
